problem_text_cn: 如下图所示,已知圆柱的高为8,底面半径为3,若用一个平面沿着上底的直径竖直向下截该圆柱,那么截面的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure below, it is known that the height of the cylinder is N_0 and the radius of the bottom surface is N_1. If a plane is used to cut the cylinder vertically downward along the diameter of the upper base, then the area of ​​the section is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵圆柱的高为8,底面半径为3,∴截面的面积为:8×(3×2)=8×6=48．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆柱的截面的面积计算．解题的关键是理解圆柱的轴截面的长、宽分别是多少．
